show.title: She Slept Through Betrayal
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/4wpX8v
show.description: She thought her family was her safe haven—until love turned into betrayal behind closed doors. Every warm smile masked a knife aimed at her back, leaving her to pick up the pieces alone. She Slept Through Betrayal is a gripping journey of deception, resilience, and finding strength in solitude.
